articles.title: Friends and Somebody Somewhere actor Mike Hagerty dies, aged 67 - ABC News

articles.title: Group Led by American Will Buy Chelsea F.C., the Team Says - The New York Times
articles.description: Todd Boehly, a part-owner of the Los Angeles Dodgers, leads a new ownership group that is set to buy the club from Roman Abramovich, a Russian oil oligarch, for more than $3 billion.

articles.title: Chelsea: American billionaire Todd Boehly completes takeover as Roman Abramovich finally sells club - Daily Mail
articles.description: Boehly saw off competition from consortiums fronted by Stephen Pagliuca and Sir Martin Broughton and even a late £4.25bn bid from Britain's richest man Sir Jim Ratcliffe.
